lead_paragraph: A fatal accident in August led Toyota to step up its inquiry of unintended acceleration, yet only last week did it come to terms with the problem’s scope.
snippet: A fatal accident in August led Toyota to step up its inquiry of unintended acceleration, yet only last week did it come to terms with the problem’s scope.

headline.main: Toyota’s Slow Awakening to a Deadly Problem
headline.seo: Toyota Slow to See Scope of Problem Even After Fatal Crash
headline.print_headline: Toyota’s Slow Awakening to a Deadly Problem

byline.contributor: Matt Richtel contributed reporting from San Francisco, Clifford Krauss from Houston and Matthew L. Wald from Washington.
